title: All 32 - Detroit Lions: Pressure on Matt Patricia to have winning season in 2020 with Tori Petry (Football 6/10)
description:
We continue to catch up with every team in the league and the latest guest in our 'All 32' series is Tori Petry from detroitlions.com. Tori and host Will Brinson discuss the team's inability to close out tight games in 2019 and what must change in 2020 (4:00), plus Matthew Stafford getting re-inserted into the offense following an injury-plagued season (5:30). They also cover Detroit's defense including their familiarity and affinity for former Patriots players (11:15), as well as the barometer for success for the Lions in their upcoming campaign (16:00).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @toripetry
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:title: All 32 - Detroit Lions: Pressure on Matt Patricia to have winning season in 2020 with Tori Petry (Football 6/10)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Will Matthew Stafford be able to re-gain his early 2019 form? Tori Petry of detroitlions.com answers that and more on the latest episode of our 'All 32' series.
